title: Large-Scale University Lecture Types and Teaching Methods Analysis: Educational Design through Systematic Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of Foundational Major-Specific Knowledge (Beginner Level in Medical/Legal/Technical Fields)
context.additional_context: BYOD-based educational program for enhancing social domain job competencies

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain the characteristics of six core types of university lectures (traditional lectures, blended lectures, flipped lectures, etc.).
Learners can establish a system to analyze effectiveness data by lecture type using literature review methodologies.
Learners can develop instructional strategies that incorporate student motivation factors (technical support, assessment methods) when designing lectures.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
